author: Ngoc Duc
title: Background Removal for Product Images
description: An optimized AI system for automatic background removal in e-commerce, delivering real-time performance on CPU and scalable bulk processing.

main_image.caption: Background Removal for E-commerce Product Enhancement

problem_statement.text: E-commerce stores spent 5–10 minutes per image on manual background removal. Existing AI tools required costly GPUs and either produced low-quality outputs or were too slow for large catalogs.

my_role.text: As Technical Lead, I selected lightweight models (MODNet, RVM, RobustMatting), optimized them for CPU via quantization and multi-threading, and designed APIs + UI for seamless integration into Shopify/WooCommerce workflows.

technical_solution.text:
• Lightweight model deployment: adapted MODNet/RVM for CPU with quantization.
• Multi-threading & batch processing: supported 3+ concurrent requests and 500+ images per batch.
• GPU acceleration optional: 50% throughput gain for high-volume uploads.
• API-first design: RESTful integration with major e-commerce platforms.

technical_solution.caption: Before and after comparison of product background removal

measurement_improvement.text: Reduced processing from 5–10 minutes to 1.2s per image (≈500x faster). Achieved 94% accuracy for standard products and 79% for complex/reflective items.

real_world_impact.text: Cut product listing time by 80%, saved $2k–$5k monthly in design costs, improved catalog consistency, and boosted conversion rates by 15–22% for clean-background images.
